topics: Word of God as transformative agent
Sovereignty of God in establishing kingdom
sentimentFlow: The sermon opens with a cautionary tone about cultural pressures squeezing people into worldly shapes, creating mild tension around conformity and broken values. It then arcs upward into excitement and hope, celebrating Jesus' radiant transformation and the empowering reality of his kingdom through inner change. It closes lightly with uplifting assurance of personal renewal and a grateful prayer for ongoing growth.
